name: ShopperCaddie
0:
”Alexa, open hello caddie”
”Alexa, start hello caddie and sign in”
”Alexa, launch hello caddie”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hello caddie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ShopperCaddie is a one stop solution for personal shopping management from product and recipe selection to utilization. The app informs about best practices for food storage and also notifies about expiry dates for grocery products, coupons, gift cards and warranties. It will help in preparing shopping list, identifying healthy products and recipes, accessing (storing, sharing and tracking) information about all bought products that needs to be tracked. Search and easily access loyalty cards, warranties, store coupons and gift cards information. Users can scan product and get product information or filter recipes and products based on allergies and calories. Visit ShopperCaddie.com to know about the app.

The ShopperCaddie skill application supports the following features for the app. Users can add a new item, add a new label, assign a label to an item, list all items, list all items by label, delete item , delete label and also get food storage tips. The skill can also answer some of the FAQ's related to ShopperCaddie mobile application.
